recipe.title: Chocolate Cherries Jubilee
ingredients: 1 pint chocolate chocolate chip ice cream
instructions: Melt preserves in heavy small saucepan over low heat, stirring frequently. Mix in cinnamon and Cognac.
Scoop ice cream into bowls. Spoon sauce over. Sprinkle with almonds.
Scoop ice cream into bowls. Spoon sauce over. Sprinkle with almonds.
